Description: 具有學術或專業領域之文章論文。
EnglishDescription: Authoring a paper or an article of academic or professional interest in a peer-reviewed publication.

Description: 發表或參與國內外研討會等專業領域活動。
EnglishDescription: Presenting or participating in national/international professional association meetings/conferences.

Description: 獲得資金，執行政府及/或產業相關計畫。
EnglishDescription: Receive funding to execute government and/or industry project.

Description: 著有教科書或實務方面的書籍。
EnglishDescription: Publishing a textbook or practitioner-oriented book.

Description: 參與投入於可對其教學領域有所貢獻之專業活動，例如在其學術領域有設計新課程。
EnglishDescription: Engaging in other professional duties and responsibilities deemed sufficient to demonstrate currency in the teaching area, e.g., designing a new course in her/his academic field.

Description: 擔任學術期刊及/或政府專案的審查委員之經歷。
EnglishDescription: Serving as a reviewer for academic articles, and/or government-related projects.
